abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron calls on community and religious groups to do more to stop radicalization of young British Muslims and offers help to British schoolgirls believed to be traveling to Syria to join Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron said that the authorities would do everything they could to help the three teenagers, who were believed to be traveling to Syria.

headline.main: Concern in Britain as Schoolgirls Seek to Join Islamic State
headline.print_headline: Britain: Cameron Offers Help for Syria-Bound Girls

snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron said that the authorities would do everything they could to help the three teenagers, who were believed to be traveling to Syria.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
